content: this simple sock pattern includes instructions on how to make a picot cuff and an eye of partridge heel flap there are three sizes available and the pattern can be easily adjusted for different foot lengths/shoe sizes there is a video tutorial for a close up instruction of how to construct the picot cuff this pattern is designed to be used with a 50g mini skein of fingering weight yarn for the main color as well as a 20g mini skein for a contrast heel and toe
